Return Type/Usage: Returns the current time in struct timeval.

Description: Retrieves time from specific clocks (CLOCK_REALTIME, CLOCK_MONOTONIC, etc.).
Return Type/Usage: Returns the time of a specified clock in struct timespec.

Description: Retrieves the resolution of a specified clock.
Return Type/Usage: Returns the resolution of the clock in struct timespec.

Description: Gets the current time as the number of seconds since the Unix epoch.
Return Type/Usage: Returns the current time as a time_t.

Description: Retrieves the current CPU and NUMA node.
Return Type/Usage: Returns the CPU number and NUMA node as integers.

Description: Retrieves auxiliary values like architecture info.
Return Type/Usage: Returns values (e.g., architecture, OS version) or 0 if unavailable.
